metadata.title: CVE-2017-11550 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The id3_ucs4_length function in ucs4.c in libid3tag 0.15.1b allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (NULL Pointer Dereference andapplication crash) via a crafted mp3 file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11550` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libid3tag0 - 0.15.1b-10ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libid3tag package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.15.1b-10ubuntu1').
